/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
